article_text:
Richard Tsong-Taatarii – Star Tribune

Gallery: At the Ridgedale Best Buy in Minnetonka, Dollie Merritt, of Chicago was one of the first people waiting in line to pay for a doorbuster tv set on sale for herself and for her daughter.

og.description: Shoppers got an early start at Best Buy and Target stores.
og.title: Early start for Black Friday
